column2: Even long after the Event, the Czartoryski family is still trying to get what they were legally entitled to ages ago, The Crown of Poland and Lithuania.
Descended from Great poet, Sunthorn Phu, his descendants reintroduced Nation, Religion and Monarchy to the Siamese and ushered it into prosperity.
It was [This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] who united the Russias and crowned General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Stalinist Cause. A true heir of Lord Stalin.

[This.Founder.GetFullName] vanquished [This.Founder.GetHerHis] wicked adoptive brother and became a paragon of virtue for all generations to follow.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] re-established the Sikh Empire, becoming the champion of the Sikh faith and defender of the Khalsa.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] re-established the Sikh Empire, becoming the champion of the Sikh faith and defender of the Khalsa.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] united all the realms of India beneath the aegis of a Hindu ruler, saving the land of Bharat from foreign domination.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] united all the realms of India beneath the aegis of a Hindu ruler, saving the land of Bharat from foreign domination.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] united all of Hind under Muslim rule, allowing Islam to dominate India once more and become the true successors of ancient Hindustan.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] united all of Hind under Muslim rule, allowing Islam to dominate India once more and become the true successors of ancient Hindustan.
Founder of the Mesopotamian religion, Mubarak rose from an obscure scholar to a powerful ruler after translating ancient texts.
Paulius Juze, also known as 'the Purifier', overthrew the pagan monarchs of Lithuania and began the effort that led to the extinction of the neo-Romuva faith.
A king of near-mythic status, Mindaugas reformed the Kingdom of Lithuania after the chaos of the Event, and patronised the neo-Romuva faith.
Claiming descent from many different pre-Event dynasties, Leopold briefly united the Benelux as the King of Enedwaith, though it did not survive [This.Founder.GetHerHis] death.
Jaan van Zolt, better known by [This.Founder.GetHerHis] nickname 'Saltspite', was a bastard-son of Emperor Leopold who decided to forge [This.Founder.GetHerHis] own destiny.
Famous in story and song, these knights came from all over Spain and France. Their deeds have inspired generations of warriors.

An Italian Knight said to have seduced many a woman in his journey ñ and some tales say even many a man ñ Rinaldo the Lover was however also the fastest rider of the Fourteen. It is said his horseís breath was thunder, and his heart beat with the power of 250 of his kind. Bizarrely, the oldest depiction show the horse as more of a contraption of some kind, with a single eye in the front and long horns to hold. He was one of the four that survived Thez the Mighty to then return home.

A Spanish lord turned adventurer, Alonso was known as a slayer of giants and armies. His bravery and madness were said to be one and the same, and it is said even his companions feared him when he entered combat. Despite this, Alonso survived Thez the Mighty and returned to his estate, living the rest of his life as a philosopher, rather than a fighter.

Born in Italy but raised in Lybia, Ruggiero was said to be a wizard that wielded mystical spells. He could ëturn a bottle into a doom of fireí and ëdestroy buildings with the toss of a stoneí using magical objects he crafted himself, and for this he was also known as Ruggiero the Artificier. It is said he died when one of his spells was thrown back at him by a skilled opponent.

A Belgian warrior that was said to shoot his crossbow faster than his own shadow. He fought and defeated a brotherhood of four bandit leaders, and then joined forces with the Paladins to defend all of Europe. Cunning and skilled, Luke the Lucky was one of the four that survived Thez the Mighty, returning to his home.

A German warrior that stood as ëThe tallest of all Germans and the strongest of all mení, it is said he could defeat Thez and Roland more often than they could defeat him, though some legends claim that was only because he could turn into a bear. He was said to have died killed by a hunter while he was in his bear form.

A Swiss Archer of great fame, it is said him and Robin the Hooded had a friendly rivalry. Both were said to be ëthe finest masters of sniping the world had ever seení, and that ëno other man has ever killed as many people as they did without being seení. William was one of the four paladins that survived Thez the Mighty, and upon his death returned to his home.

A warrior woman born from Moroccan parents on Italian soil, Clorinda was said to be the bravest of warriors. She was a horseman of renown. The Novelist tell the tale of how she once saved the last Bonaparte, and for this feat of courage she was awarded the right for her and her descendants to bear the figure of Bonaparte on his horse as her sigil. She died in the arms of his husband during a siege.

Born in Ireland, it is said that Finn got his name for his cold, composed nature and his wisdom in battle. Once the leader of his own band of warriors, he joined the Paladins to bring peace in the lands of Europe. Finn the Cool was said to have many lovers but no wife, and no one knows if he sired any sons.

The English man of the woods, that some believe to have been a fey in disguise, was said to once lead an adventuring band known as the Merry Men, only to decide to join Thez the Mighty after he defeated him and his band. Robin was said to be a ësniperí of great talent, and is said to have once struck with a ëLapua arrowí an enemy over three kilometers away. He died of sickness.

A French warrior that was said to be so strong that he could uproot a tree with his bare hands and use it to pummel his opponent to death with this makeshift mace, but to also be the friendliest of men outside of battle. Legend says he was the first to die, cut down by a far off foe with a perfect hit in the head.

Born in Spain, Rodrigo the Champion was said to be a gallant knight of fame and honor that travelled from Santiago to Barcelona several times before joining the Paladins. He is said to have once cut down a line of fifty men with his thrusted sword, ìAmetralladoraî. He died the richest of the Fourteen, ruling over a domain his family holds to this day.

Born in England but raised in the Italian island of Sardinia, Astolfo the Kind was said to fly into battle on his hippogriff, a steed that some said was made of metal and some say was armored to protect him. It is said Astolfo would rain death upon his enemies, and that he was killed in combat by a ball of fire launched by a cowardly mage.

The First of the Fourteen Paladins, born in Portugal, he was said to be a giant of a man. He would proudly wield his weapon, a giant contraption too big to be called a sword, and would never yield in the face of the horrors that plagued the world, vowing to never rest. He was the last to die, and his tomb is to this day preserved by the Kings of Portugal.

With the Exile of Sultan Jamshid 'Escalbor' Al-Said from [This.Founder.GetHerHis] homeland, he came to the realm of the Queen, of whom he knew personally. His titles and house preserved by her, he was granted domain of Winchester by her grace, there the dynasty has ruled as Knight-Counts of the Winchester Round Table and fought alongside Lord Protector Laundsallyn in Numenor, where they won great acclaim in Arnor.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] reforged the Ottoman Empire, proving themselves the rightful ruler over all Turks as the Osman of Rome.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] reforged the Ottoman Empire, proving themselves the rightful ruler over all Turks as the Osman of Rome.

Legends tell of the immense strength and size of the Ottoman Empire, how it dominated three continents and brought the Europeans to heel. In ancient days the Osman of Rome assumed leadership over all of Dar as-Salam, but due to the treachery of the Arabs, this power and unity was broken. Now, for the first time in centuries, the Empire rises again. Under the leadership of [e_ottoman.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick], the Empire has been reunited, and [e_ottoman.Holder.GetSheHe] has been crowned Osman of Rome, as [e_ottoman.Holder.GetSheHe] claims is [e_ottoman.Holder.GetHersHis] right, as [e_ottoman.Holder.GetSheHe] is a descendent of the mighty Osman. Only time will tell if this new Empire will reach the same heights as its glorious predecessor.
May they be as rightfully guided as their predecessor.
We will fight them until the bitter end!
We have not forgotten Varna, you mongrels!
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] restored the Byzantine Empire, earning themselves a near-mythic status among Orthodox Christians.

Since long before the Event, legends have told of ancient Rome, and how it single-handedly defended the Christians from Turkish aggression for centuries. Though it fell, its memory has been etched deep into the Greek people for centuries. Now, one ruler has undone centuries of insults. Imitating the actions of Great Constantine, [e_byzantium.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] has triumphed over the idolatrous pagans who occupied Hellas after the Event, as well as the heretic Mohammedans who seized Anatolia, and has refounded Rome. Orthodox Christians the world over dance for joy, knowing that the Emperor lives once again. Only time will tell if this New Rome will last, or reach the heights of its ancient glory.
Glory to God in the Highest!
We defeated you once, Greeks, and we can do it again!
How can this be? Have the Gods abandoned us?
Perhaps we can finally call an Ecumenical Council now
It is good to see our brothers in Christ on the resurgence
Perfidious infidels! You cannot turn back time, nor resist the will of God!
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] proved a worthy successor to Alexander, reconquering his Empire and establishing Hellenic dominance.

Ancient myths tell of Great Alexander, and how his Empire stretched from sea to sea, from the peaks of Hellas to the Himalayas. It was only due to his skill and devotion to the Gods that Alexander was able to conquer this, but his descendants squandered his strength and converted to Christianity, allowing the Turkish hordes to fracture the Empire further. However, under the great leadership of [e_macedonia.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick], the true people of Hellas have prevailed, and the Empire of Makedon has now been re-established. True Hellenes rejoice, for under Great Makedon, all the ancient glory of Alexander will be restored!
They have reverted to barbarism, to the ways of their pagan forefathers
God preserve us from the savage heathens!
Returning to polytheism? I am sickened just by thinking about it.
This is no concern of ours.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] solidified the rule of the Marble Empire, earning themselves a near-mythic status among Marblist Christians.

Since long before the Event, legends have told of Constantine, and how it single-handedly defended the Christians from Turkish and Goth aggression for centuries. Though it fell, its memory has been etched deep into the Greek people for centuries. Now, one ruler has undone centuries of insults. Imitating the actions of Great Constantine, [e_marblists.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] has triumphed over the idolatrous pagans who occupied Hellas after the Event, as well as the heretic Mohammedans who seized Anatolia, and has refounded Rome. Marblist Christians the world over dance for joy, knowing that the Emperor lives once again. Only time will tell if this New Rome will last, or reach the heights of its ancient glory.
Glory to God in the Highest!
We defeated you once, Greeks, and we can do it again!
How can this be? Have the Gods abandoned us?
Perhaps we can finally call an Ecumenical Council now
It is good to see our brothers in Christ on the resurgence
Perfidious infidels! You cannot turn back time, nor resist the will of God!
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] solidified the rule of the Latin Empire, restoring the bulwark of christendom against the east.

Long before the Event, legends have told of a great Catholic Empire which ruled over the Aegean taking over the role as the bulwark of christandom at a vital moment. Imitating the actions of those great Frankish Kings, [e_latin_empire.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] has triumphed over the idolatrous pagans who occupied Hellas after the Event, as well as the heretic Mohammedans who seized Anatolia, and has refounded that mighty state. Catholic Christians the world over dance for joy, knowing that the bulwark of Christendom has returned!
Glory to God in the Highest!
How can this be? Have the Gods abandoned us?
Perfidious infidels! You cannot turn back time, nor resist the will of God!

Throughout much of its history, the Isle of Mann has seldom known true freedom. Its strategic location has long attracted the attention of numerous conquerors, each eager to claim the island for themselves. These invaders often intermingled with the locals, forging the resilient and proud people who now call the island home. Thanks to the efforts of [e_mann.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick], the [manx.GetName] people have risen to new heights, establishing an empire that might rival the glory of ancient Rome itself.
May the [manx.GetName] remain in favour of Mannan
The conquered have become the conquerors, why have we been forsaken?

Long before the Event, legends spoke of a grand union between the people of Poland and Lithunia, which once acted as the great bulwark against the Russian aggressors to the East and the German aggressors to the West, marking an era of great prosperity previously unexpected from the region. Though the union had long since dissolved, its legacy remained deeply rooted in the hearts of many people. However, centuries of disunity was reversed through the actions of [e_commonwealth.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] who emulates their ancestral glory through the restoration of the Commonwealth. The people of Poland and Lithunia now rejoice, knowing the great union stands tall once more. Only time will tell if this new Commonwealth will endure and rise to the heights of its exalted predecessor.
Will they once again act as the great bulwark of Christendom?
Will they once again act as the great bulwark for our people?

Since long before the Event, legends have told of Hindustan, a powerful Muslim realm that dominated much of India, stretching from the Darab mountains all the way to the rich and fertile soil of Bengal. Though with time, it slowly declined due to instability and infighting before eventually collapsing to the army of the British Queen, plunging the land of the Hind to fall into darkness. Now, for the first time in centuries, under the leadership of [e_mughal.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick], the light of Islam shines brightly over India once more, and [e_mughal.Holder.GetSheHe] has been crowned [e_mughal.Holder.GetTitle], ushering a new era of prosperity for the region as a whole. Only time will tell if this new empire shall rise to the heights of its venerable predecessor as the light that shines forever bright.
It is good to see our brothers in Islam revitalized
They aren't coming for us now, are they?
The Crown Jewel of the Queen has truly been lost
A United Realm of the Dharma

Since long before the Event, legends have told of time where all the people of India were united under the great banner of Bharat, a realm so vast that it encompasses the entire subcontinent. Many before us have claimed to rule these lands, from the Persian Mohammedans to the British Queen, but through all hardships our ancestors have preserved, working tirelessly to push out these invaders from our homeland, all led by the fabled Samrat Chakravartin. Though Bharat has long since fallen, its memory has been etched deep into the hearts of people for centuries. Now, through the great efforts of [e_india.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick], the lands of Bharat are united once more all under [e_india.Holder.GetHerHis] rule, acting as the divine aegis of India and protecting the realm once more from foreign dominance as the newly declared Samrat Chakravartin. Only time will tell if this new empire shall rise to the heights of its venerable predecessor as the great land of Dharma
How can this be? Will Islam truly be forgotten?
Praise be [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], the land of the Dharma is united!
They aren't coming for us now, are they?
The Crown Jewel of the Queen has truly been lost
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] reunited the crowns of Poland and Lithunia under one rule, ensuring that the Commonwealth once more dominates the region.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] reunited the crowns of Poland and Lithunia under one rule, ensuring that the Commonwealth once more dominates the region..
A figure regarded with deific status in India, the Mahatma is famed in legend for expelling the British, and for inspiring a moral revolution among the Indian people.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] restored the High Kingdom of Numenor, ushering in a new era of glory, prosperity, and unity for the Novelist faithful.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] restored the High Kingdom of Numenor, ushering in a new era of glory, prosperity, and unity for the Novelist faithful.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] restored the High Kingdom of Numenor, ushering in a new era of glory, prosperity, and unity for the Novelist faithful.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] restored the High Kingdom of Numenor, ushering in a new era of glory, prosperity, and unity for the Novelist faithful.
Ancient Blood of the Thunder Dragon
Since time immemorial, the Wangchuck Emperors have ruled Bhutan, providing a stable and unbroken line of governance.

The Muwahidunna, or Monotheists, are a religion formed by the Marabout-Turned Mahdi Isma'il the Visionary, first unifier of the Sahara. It is a faith that professes that all the faiths of the people of the book - the Chrislamists, Christians, Muslims and Jews contain a certain grain of truth, and should not get bogged down in fighting over doctrine. For they all worship a single God, and kneel to him, and as long as that is true, it does not matter how they do it.
Uniting the Saharan Nomads for the first time in history, Isma'il became the prophet of a new syncretic religion that aimed to harmonise all monotheistic religions into one.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] reunited the scattered Saharan Nomads, reforging the great Empire of Isma'il.
This character led the Irish Rebellion of 2553 to success, re-establishing Irish independence from Britain even if it soon collapsed into infighting. Songs will be forever sung of their deeds.

After years of planning, organising, and fighting, [k_irish_rebels.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] has finally forced the British armies to withdraw from Ireland, as well as securing a ten-year unilateral peace treaty. Though the British might yet decide to return, this is still a great victory which will live in the memory of the Gaels until the moon fails. Throughout the country, wild parties are thrown as soldiers return home from the war, their womenfolk joyously receiving them home.
Those barbarians have always been a pain in our side...
Enemies or not, you have to admire their tenacity
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] dedicated [This.Founder.GetHerHis] life to build an empire of blood and skulls in honor of [This.Founder.GetHerHis] Madame Guillotine.

column2: [This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] unified the great Empire of Shambhala, forming a paradise on Earth for Buddhists, where peace and learning flourish.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] conquered Spain for Islam, bringing back the great Empire of Al-Andalus.
Al-Andalus, the lost Empire of the Moors, has been long forgotten by Europe. However, a brave warrior of Islam might try to restore the glorious domain of Granada
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] founded the Post-Judgement Vessel of God's Purity as Millennial Kingdom of God on All Earth, earning themselves a near-mythic status among Neo-Donatists.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] returned Athos back to Christian rule, re-establishing the old monasteries once more.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] freed Jerusalem during a climactic siege and was later proclaimed as the long awaited King of Israel Mashiach ben David.
This character is carries the blood of the Reincarnation of Xwede, the Yarsani god.
This character brought the Aeon of Thmaist upon the world, bringing in a new Thelemic era.
The promised Messiah, savior of the world and holy icon according to the Mikraist belief.

column2: This character carries inside them the blood of the madam's chosen leader of the revolution for now...
Sultan Baraduli "The Storm of Arabia" Arambiz was the greatest warrior of the Amriqi. A Conqueror from a young age, a natural warrior, and a champion of Allah.
Sultan Baraduli "The Storm of Arabia" Arambiz was the greatest warrior of the Amriqi. A Conqueror from a young age, a natural warrior, and a champion of Allah.
Legendary controllers of the French economy of the old world, it's said that many leaders had to bow to them in order to trade in antediluvian France.
This idealistic diplomat claims descent from one of the legendary warriors that aided China against The Eight Armies. Whether for Christ or the Jade Chairman, is another question entirely.
This brave commander claims descent from one of the legendary warriors that aided China against The Eight Armies on behalf of the Heavenly Jade Chairman.
This ambitious and cunning soldier claims descent from one of the legendary warriors that aided China against The Eight Armies. On whose behalf however, has been lost to time.
Condemned by Novelists for apostasy and taking on the name of an evil god, the Frankenstein family continues their unnatural schemes into the occult...

The sole survivor, The Mad Count, The wild boar. [This.GetFirstName] has been called these and more. But he is all that is left of the Galo Lords of Yore, a mark [This.Founder.GetHerHis] sons will bear forever.

Unlike most of [This.Founder.GetHerHis] [This.Founder.Culture.GetGroupName] contemporaries, [This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has dedicated [This.Founder.GetHerselfHimself] to practicing the [This.Founder.Religion.GetName] and worshipping its god Poseidon.
H oikogeneia aytou tou xaraktira katagetai apo to nish tou Amorgou kai einai gnosth gia tis paraplanitikes ikanotites tous.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] claims descent from Charlemagne, the greatest ruler of the Franks, the forefathers of the French and a respected monarch in all of western Christendom.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] claims descent from Charlemagne, the greatest ruler of the Franks, the forefathers of the French and a respected monarch in all of western Christendom.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has brought glory to the Albanian people, and will be remembered as a hero for generations to come.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has brought glory to the Albanian people, and will be remembered as a hero for generations to come.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] claims descent from the legendary Shaktimaan.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has committed unspeakable actions comparable only to the mythical beast.

[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has brought glory to the names of the ancient Angevins by restoring their empire, and will be remembered as a hero by the Anglo, Britannic and French peoples for generations to come.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] migrated from the deep Siberia downwards and founded a new realm which he ruled alongside his sons.
Descended from the ancient family of Tzars known as the "Romanovs", these Tzars ruled for centuries until their line was ended by the Usurper Stalin who consumed Nicholas the Martyr's Essence.

Hereward the Wake, great hero of yore, who resisted the unjust invaders and led a popular rebellion against them. His tale was so great he would spawn the legend of Robin Hood, who became a renown figure across the world by his own right. All men of this dynasty go by the nickname "Hereward" in remembrance of their famous ancestor.
This character is a descendant of the ancient von Habsburg family, they are the traditional rulers of the kingdom of Austria.
This character is a descendant of the ancient Bernadotte family, they are the traditional rulers of the kingdom of Sweden.
This character is a descendant of the ancient Bourbon dynasty, having ruled France, Spain and parts of Italy for centuries before the Event.
This person is distantly related to the Ancient Proud house of Wangchuk, most likely matrilineally through a Bhutanese Princess

The Windsor Scions are believed to be distantly related to the queen. They became related during her last time on earth where she spawned several of their ancestors through the assistance of a male member of the line.

The Gl¸cksburgs were the ancient rulers of Denmark and as such are respected by the people of Denmark, despite their fall from power. Additionally, they are well liked by Novelists for an ancestor's assistance in reproducing sections of the Novel.
The Brothers Grimm were known for compiling several texts of the Novel.
This character is said to be descended from death itself!

Originaly a novelist mercenary from France, [This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to conquer Transylvania after its ruler didn't give [This.Founder.GetHerHim] [This.Founder.GetHerHis] pay.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] spread the seed of conquest across the steppes of old Cumania, restoring the empire in the process.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] spread the seed of conquest across the steppes of old Scythia, restoring the empire in the process.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has finally managed to reach China. It is now [This.Founder.GetHerHis] and [This.Founder.GetHerHis] bloodline's destiny to conquer the world.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has brought glory to the [manx.GetName] people by forming a prestigious Empire that is bound to reach heights comparable to that of Rome itself.

[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has distinguished [This.Founder.GetHerselfHimself] among the rest of [This.Founder.GetHerHis] mercenary peers for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] exceptional work on the battlefield.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] is the patron saint of nobles, revered by many people in Nistrenia.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName], also known as the Dragon of Hellas, united the shattered land of Makedon and founded an empire worthy of AnaxÛrgos' flock.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has become renowned for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] exceptional work on architecture. [This.Founder.GetHerHis] talents are sought after by many.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] was the founder of the Minotakis dynasty. It is said that [This.Founder.GetSheHe] has direct descent to the ancient kings of Crete.

[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has founded the ancient kingdom of Laconia, known for their disciplined and indominable warriors. Descendants of this bloodline should do their best to live up to those standards.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has founded the Empire of the High Seas, proving himself to be a legendary pirate.
The founder of the Mongol Empire, proclaimed 'Genghis Khan' (Universal Ruler) by the many subjugated peoples of the steppe. An extremely brutal and efficient leader.
